text:
Lucia Cammarano (born 27 July 1992) is an Italian rugby union player. She took part in the 2014 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup, and 2019 Women's Six Nations Championship.
She played for Monza, where they won the 2013-2014 Serie A championship. She played as a hooker for Belve Neroverdi from L' Aquila.
